{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from ncoop57_mages.core import Mage, Ability, Demon
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

init_player[source]

init_player()

Initializes a player, Mage, with the user's speciality and name

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

player = init_player() print(player)

{% raw %}

combat[source]

combat(player, boss)

Perform combat between a player, Mage, which was generated with the init_player, and a Demon

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

boss = Demon("Jerry", 30) combat(player, boss)

{% raw %}

game_loop[source]

game_loop(player, n=5)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

player = init_player() game_loop(player, 1)
